fields.name: studyId
fields.title: Study unique ID
fields.description: Semicolon-separated list of (internal) study identifiers (cross-referencing to study worksheet) where the event was recorded.

fields.name: expeFactorDesc
fields.title: Experimental Factor description
fields.description: Free text description of the experimental factor. This includes all relevant treatments planification and protocol planned for all the plants targeted by a given experimental factor.

fields.name: expeFactorValues
fields.title: Experimental Factor values
fields.description: List of possible values for the factor.
